resources.string: In this fast-moving word game, players race through a series of popular topics while trying to shout out words that start with the letter currently on-screen.
Agree to a set of popular topics. Make sure they’re fun and accessible to all players.

The game starts by choosing a random player as the first turn. It gives the player 10secs to get ready and then it shows them the letter that they are to shout a word that starts with it. 

For example, if the current topic is “Cars”, and the game presents letter “A”, the player whose turn it currently is might shout “Aston Martin” or “Astra (Opel)”. 

Players only have 5secs to shout out a valid word before gameplay moves on to the next player. 

If a player shouts a valid word, they tap the green button to get awarded a point. If not, they tap the red button to pass gameplay to the next player. 

Play continues in this manner until all agreed to topics have been played at which point players can view the score sheet to know the winner.
